column4:
description:"### Context

This contains data of news headlines published over a period of eighteen years.

Sourced from the reputable Australian news source ABC (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)

Agency Site: (http://www.abc.net.au)

### Content

Format: CSV ; Single File

 1. **publish_date**: Date of publishing for the article in yyyyMMdd format
 2. **headline_text**: Text of the headline in Ascii
column6:
lowercase

Start Date: **2003-02-19** ; End Date: **2020-12-31**

### Inspiration

I look at this news dataset as a summarised historical record of noteworthy events in the globe from early-2003 to end-2020 with a more granular focus on Australia.

This includes the entire corpus of articles published by the abcnews website in the given date range. 
With a volume of two hundred articles per day and a good focus on international news
column7: we can be fairly certain that every event of significance has been captured here.\n\nDigging into the keywords
column8: one can see all the important episodes shaping the last decade and how they evolved over time.\nEx: afghanistan war
column14:
criminal activity et cetera.

### Similar Work

Similar news datasets exploring other attributes
column15:
countries and topics can be seen on my [profile](/therohk). 

Your kernals can be reused with minimal changes across all these datasets.

Prepared by **Rohit Kulkarni**
"
